ヤコビ(Jacobi)関数

  1. 微分方程式

\[(1-x^2)\frac{d^2 P^{(\alpha, \beta)}_n(x)}{dx^2} + [\beta - \alpha + (\alpha +\beta + 2)x] \frac{d P^{(\alpha, \beta)}_n(x)}{dx} + n (n+\alpha+\beta+1) P^{(\alpha, \beta)}_n(x) =0\]

  1. 直行関係

\[\int^{1}_{-1} (1-x)^\alpha (1+x)^\beta P^{(\alpha, \beta)}_n(x) P^{(\alpha, \beta)}_m(x) dx = \delta_{n, m} \frac{2^{\alpha+\beta+1}}{2n+\alpha+\beta+1} \frac{\Gamma(n+\alpha+1)\Gamma(n+\beta+1)}{n!\Gamma(n+\alpha+\beta+1)}\]

  1. 漸化式

\[\begin{aligned} & P^{(\alpha, \beta)}_n(x) = \frac{(B+Cx) P^{(\alpha, \beta)}_{n-1}(x) - D P^{(\alpha, \beta)}_{n-2}(x) }{A} \\ & \text{ここで、} \left\{ \begin{array}{l} A = 2n (n + \alpha + \beta) (2n + \alpha + \beta -2)\\ B = (2n + \alpha + \beta -1) (\alpha^2 - \beta^2) \\ C = (2n + \alpha + \beta -1) (2n + \alpha + \beta) (2n + \alpha + \beta -2) \\ D = 2 (n + \alpha -1) (n + \beta -1) (2n +\alpha + \beta) \end{array} \right. & P^{(\alpha, \beta)}_0(x) = 1 & P^{(\alpha, \beta)}_1(x) = \frac{1}{2}((2+\alpha+\beta)x+(\alpha-\beta)) \end{aligned}\]
